issue.title: [R] Cannot open parquet files with binary arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9301](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9301). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When trying to open a parquet file with a binary column the following error is returned:```
Error in Table__to_dataframe(x, use_threads = option_use_threads()) : 
  cannot handle Array of type binary

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9301?focusedCommentId=17150578) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This was resolved (yesterday, in fact) in ARROW-6235. Please retry with a nightly build (you may need to wait a few more hours for the latest build to be available, depending on your OS) and reopen the issue if you still have trouble.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9301?focusedCommentId=17585786) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
